select n.nbidx ,n.title ,n.content ,n.wdate ,u.email ,u.name FROM notice n , usertable u WHERE n.midx = u.midx AND n.delyn = 'N'
AND n.title like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%')
AND n.content like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR u.name like concat('%',#{searchType},'%')
LIMIT #{page}, #{perPageNum}

SELECT count(n.nbidx) FROM notice n , usertable u WHERE n.midx = u.midx AND n.delyn = 'N'
AND n.title like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%')
AND n.content like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') OR u.name like concat('%',#{searchType},'%')
SELECT n.nbidx ,n.title ,n.content ,n.wdate ,n.filename ,n.midx ,u.email ,u.name ,u.midx FROM notice n , usertable u WHERE n.midx = u.midx AND n.nbidx = #{nbidx}
